Napier council proposes one fewer seat at the table https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-council-proposes-one-fewer-seat-at-the-table/3FA2PAX4UBHG3LHZLIA4DMM6ZQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-council-proposes-one-fewer-seat-at-the-table/3FA2PAX4UBHG3LHZLIA4DMM6ZQ/ Doug LaingCouncil representation has to be reviewed every six years. Mon, 08 Jul 2024 21:43:27 +0000 Napier Mayor Kirsten Wise (second from right) listens at a protest in 2021 against a council decision not to establish a Māori ward at the 2022 elections. Having changed its representation in 2019, the council later in 2021 decided to include provision for at least one Māori ward in its representation review of the 2025 election. Photo / NZME
